name: Business Master
author: Frank Corso

sections.description:
Business Master allows you to analyse your visitor information by capturing their information. Keep track of how your website is doing with Business Master.

Features Include

  • Shows How Many Daily Visitors
  • Shows How Many Daily Page Views
  • Shows How Many Weekly Visitors
  • Shows How Many Monthly Visitors
  • Shows How Many Quarterly Visitors
  • Compare Data To Previous Time Periods
  • Shows What Countries Visitors Are From
  • Shows What Browser Visitors Use
  • Shows What Websites Referred Them To Your Website

This plugin is in early beta. Please use the support forum or widget inside plugin to give feedback or suggestions.
sections.installation:
We now offer an installation service to assist you in this process. We will install any or all of our plugins and spend up to 2 hours with you for consultation and training. Visit our website for details.
My Local Webstop Plugin Installation

Or

  • Navigate to Add New Plugin page within your WordPress
  • Search for Quiz Master Next
  • Click Install Now link on the plugin and follow the prompts
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Or

  • Upload plugin dir to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Do you offer any 1-on-1 training to assist me in using this plugin?

We now offer an installation service that includes 1-on-1 training as well as a premium support that offers 1-on-1 training. For details, visit our WordPress Store

I have an idea, how do I contact you?

Feel free to use the widget on the quiz dashboard within the plugin or from the contact page at mylocalwebstop.com.
sections.changelog:
0.2.1 (December 17, 2014)

  • Added New Dashboard Widget To Easily Get Today’s Snapshot
  • Made Slight Change To Avoid Own Server Getting In Stats From Ajax Calls And Other Pings

0.1.5 (November 24, 2014)

  • Added New Browser To Detect – Sea Monkey
  • Added New Robots To Detect – Riddler, A6, Icarus6j, Mail.RU_Bot, oBot, proximic, linkdexbot
  • Added New OS – Chrome OS

0.1.4 (November 2, 2014)

  • Added Ability To Detect iOS
  • Added New Robots To Detect – SeznamBot, SiteExplorer, meanpathbot, CrawlBot, Exabot, And More

0.1.3 (October 21, 2014)

  • Can Now Detect Chimera Browser
  • Can Now Detect Robots – Robots No Longer Count Towards Stats

0.1.2 (October 14, 2014)

  • Fixed Your Domain Referrer Bug

0.1.1 (October 1, 2014)

  • Begun Development

short_description: The best tool for analysing your website.
description:
Business Master allows you to analyse your visitor information by capturing their information. Keep track of how your website is doing with Business Master.

Features Include

  • Shows How Many Daily Visitors
  • Shows How Many Daily Page Views
  • Shows How Many Weekly Visitors
  • Shows How Many Monthly Visitors
  • Shows How Many Quarterly Visitors
  • Compare Data To Previous Time Periods
  • Shows What Countries Visitors Are From
  • Shows What Browser Visitors Use
  • Shows What Websites Referred Them To Your Website

This plugin is in early beta. Please use the support forum or widget inside plugin to give feedback or suggestions.

upgrade_notice.0.2.1: Upgrade for new dashboard widget for today's snapshot
upgrade_notice.0.1.3: Now detects chimera browser and robots/spiders. Robots will no longer count towards stats for any robot viewing your site after update. Now detects iOS.
upgrade_notice.0.1.2: Fix for a bug that caused your site to show in the top 10 in the referrer graph.
